definition: to pick/to pluck/to collect/to select/to choose/to gather
color/complexion/looks/variant of 彩[cai3]/variant of 採|采[cai3]
to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)

sentences.english: The tertiary recovery is an important means of the enhanced oil recovery.
sentences.chinese: 三次采油是提高采收率的一个重要手段。

sentences.english: Therefore, reservoir protection has been the key factor for enhancing oil and gas production and recovery ratio.
sentences.chinese: 保护油气层已成为提高油气产量和采收率的关键因素。

sentences.english: The recovery in this area is 53% before drilling inspection well.
sentences.chinese: 钻检查井前该区域采收率为53%。

sentences.english: These fractures play an important role in controlling fluid flow and recovery.
sentences.chinese: 这些裂缝在控制流体流动和采收率方面发挥重要作用。

sentences.english: For prolonged waterflood development in Pucheng Oilfield, water drive recovery factor of Oilfield is affected.
sentences.chinese: 油田经长期注水开发，影响了油田的水驱采收率。

sentences.english: Specific suggestion on the oil recovery techniques was made for Xinjiang oil field.
sentences.chinese: 对新疆油田提高采收率的方法提出了具体的建议。

sentences.english: When adding the active water dissolved with viscosity reducer to heavy oil, the oil recovery could be higher.
sentences.chinese: 稠油开采中加入降粘剂，可得到较高的采收率。

sentences.english: Improved-recovery techniques range from pressure maintenance to enhanced oil recovery.
sentences.chinese: 提高采收率方法包括压力保持和强化采油。

sentences.english: Gas injection velocity has strong effected on oil recovery for non-miscible flooding.
sentences.chinese: 注气速度对非混相驱的采收率有很大的影响。

sentences.english: Enhanced oil recovery is currently the most cost-effective method is injection.
sentences.chinese: 目前提高采收率最经济有效的方法也是注水。

definition: to explore/to survey/to prospect (for oil etc)/prospecting
remaining quantity/reserves (of natural resources, oil etc)
